App Name: My Earthquake Alerts

Brief: My Earthquake Alerts is a sophisticated mobile application geared toward providing real-time earthquake information globally. With its user-friendly interface and reliable notification system, it ensures that individuals stay informed about seismic activities that may affect their regions.
